description: Development of ECCC's annual reporting and planning documents
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Notice

**Title:** {Provision of Public Relations and Professional Communications Services}

**Number:** cb-8045-35487875

## Notice Details

* **Publication Date:** August 17th, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** [Expired] August 24th, 2023 14:00
* **Contract Start Date:** October 1st, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** March 31st, 2024

## Opportunity Details

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Services Required

* The Corporate Management Directorate of Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking a communications consultant to provide professional writing and editing services.
* The contractor will provide support in the development of the organization's annual reporting and planning documents.

## Identification Requirements

* Prospective contractors must have the capacity to demonstrate expertise in the required domain.
* Bidders are required to provide their bidder’s name and bidder’s registration number.

## Special Requirements

* The chosen contractor must possess all the necessary qualifications and competencies to perform the required work.
* Contact information is available below

## Contact Information

* *Contact Name*: Carolyne Chénier
* *Email*: [carolyne.chenier@ec.gc.ca](mailto:carolyne.chenier@ec.gc.ca)
* *Phone*: (819) 307-1927
* *Location*: 351 St-Joseph Blvd, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0H3

## Attachments

*  The tender package can be retrieved at the link [provided](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8045/task-based_npp_5000074155R.en_.pdf).

## Languages

* This tender is posted in both English and French.
* Bidders who provide their bid in another language have the responsibility to prove they can get their bid back to them in English or French.
